revised_title: Thermal and Magnetic Properties of Chromium Methylamine Alum
tldr: The authors conducted experiments on chromium methylamine alum to study its thermal and magnetic properties at low temperatures. They determined the absolute temperature down to 0.01 K and found the Curie point at 0.7 K. The results were compared with theory and showed good agreement above the Curie point. The study enabled a comparison between the Curie points of two alums differing only in their monovalent cations.
